```{r pre}
dpath <- "output-overlap"
list2 <- list.dirs(path=dpath,recursive=FALSE,full.names=TRUE)[]
toc_depth <- rmarkdown::metadata$output[[1]]$toc_depth
if (ursa:::.isRemark()) {
   aspect_ratio <- rmarkdown::metadata$output[[1]]$nature$ratio
   aspect_ratio <- as.numeric(strsplit(aspect_ratio,split="\\D")[[1]])
   aspect_ratio <- aspect_ratio[1]/aspect_ratio[2]
}
src <- lapply(list2,function(fpath) knitr::knit_expand(file="mapping3-level2.Rmd"))[]
```
